DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether extravascular lung water index (EVLI) is an independent predictor for multiorgan dysfunction syndrome (MODS) in patients with severe sepsis and to determine if increased EVLI may serve as an predictor for MODS and mortality in those patients.
DOC.brief_title: Extravascular Lung Water Index in Severe Sepsis
DOC.criteria: All enrolled patients were recruited consecutively on the day of MICU admission and within 24 hours of the diagnosis of severe sepsis. Pregnancy, Age less than 18 years old, and Uncontrolled malignancy.
